content: create a stylish and cozy ombre brimmed hat with this quick and easy crochet pattern designed to match the ombre evening scarf this hat uses just 74 g of medium worsted weight yarn red heart super saver ombre for the adult small teen size with sizes ranging from baby to adult it s perfect for the whole family if you d prefer the hat with out the bill aka brim you can omit that part of the hat entirely to have a lovely textured ombre beanie work this up in just a couple of hours and enjoy the stunning ombre effect that makes each hat unique **join the cal newsletter here ** https
